title: Kensington Dollshouse Festival Christmas Show 2015
desc: International event, with over 170 of the top dolls house builders, miniature artisans & DIY suppliers attending.? We gather together the top craftsmen from around the globe who specialise in dolls houses, baby houses & miniatures.?You will find everything you need for your house or model, with work & materials in 1:12, 1:24, 1:48 & even 1:144 scales. ?We have around 170 carefully selected craftsmen & suppliers selling everything from a beautiful dolls house mansions to tiny clothes pegs as well as a huge selection of wallpapers, lighting, small print fabrics, furniture, dolls & accessories. Located centrally near High Street Kensington Underground (2 min walk), included in your entry fee you will receive a full colour catalogue with detailed listings of all exhibitors & there is a free cloakroom. Hot & Cold snacks are available in the venue.
